name: Ear-Piercing Scream, Mythic
text: The damage dealt increases to 1d8 points of sonic damage per 2 caster levels (maximum 5d8) and the duration that creatures in the area are dazed is a number of rounds equal to your tier.

sections.name: Augmented (3rd)
sections.text: If you expend two uses of mythic power, the spell affects a 30-foot cone rather than a single target.
